message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $120. What do you think?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I still need to make a profit. How about $160?
Alice, $160 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm happy to pay $130, which is closer to my budget and a fair price for both of us. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to think about my costs and my minimum price. How about $145?
Alice, $145 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $135, but I need to stay within my budget. Let's try to reach a final agreement.
I understand you're trying to be responsible with your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $140?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price.  I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to go up to $138, but I can't go any higher. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your honesty, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $142. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product brings. Let's meet in the middle one last time.
